0.Name: The Fool
0.Past: There has been a new start and a new injection of energy. A new journey has begun.
0.Present: You are getting a fresh start. A new exciting journey is beginning that relates to your question.
0.Future: You will embark upon an exciting journey. A fresh start relating to your question will come soon.

1.Name: The Magician
1.Past: You or another actor have exerted professional influence, expertise or mastery upon the situation.
1.Present: You or another actor is exerting professional influence, expertise or mastery upon the situation.
1.Future: You or another actor will exert professional influence, expertise or mastery upon the situation.

2.Name: The High Priestess
2.Past: A strong spiritual and morally correct influence has informed the situation. There has been a spiritual looking within.
2.Present: A strong spiritual and morally correct influence is informing the situation. There is a spiritual looking within.
2.Future: A strong spiritual and morally correct influence will inform the situation. There will be a spiritual looking within.

3.Name: The Empress
3.Past: The power of abundance, healing and new life has informed the current situation.
3.Present: The power of abundance, healing and new life is informing the current situation.
3.Future: The power of abundance, healing and new life will inform the current situation.

4.Name: The Emperor
4.Past: An adult, masculine power has influenced the situation.
4.Present: An adult, masculine power is influencing the situation.
4.Future: An adult, masculine power will influence the situation.

5.Name: The Hierophant
5.Past: Conventional wisdom, orthodoxy and ritual have affected the situation.
5.Present: Conventional wisdom, orthodoxy and ritual is affecting the situation.
5.Future: Conventional wisdom, orthodoxy and ritual will affect the situation.

6.Name: The Lovers
6.Past: The power of union, sharing, trust and choice influenced the situation
6.Present: The power of union, sharing, trust and choice is influencing the situation
6.Future: The power of union, sharing and trust will influence the situation

7.Name: The Chariot
7.Past: There has been a clear decisive purpose that has harnessed opposing forces to progress the current situation.
7.Present: There is a clear decisive purpose that is harnessing opposing forces to progress the current situation.
7.Future: There will be a clear decisive purpose to harness opposing forces and progress the current situation.

8.Name: Strength
8.Past: Inner strength and conviction have progressed the current situation.
8.Present: Inner strength and conviction are progressing the current situation.
8.Future: Inner strength and conviction will progress the current situation.

9.Name: The Hermit
9.Past: Self-discovery, meditation and a journey within have influenced the current situation,
9.Present: Self-discovery, meditation and a journey within is occurring or is required at this time.
9.Future: Self-discovery, meditation and a journey within is necessary.

10.Name: Wheel of Fortune
10.Past: There has been some good luck. An upturn of fate on the sea of fortune has benefited you.
10.Present: Good luck is presenting. An upturn of fate on the sea of fortune is benefiting you.
10.Future: There will be some good luck. An upturn of fate on the sea of fortune will benefit you.

11.Name: Justice
11.Past: Harmony, fairness and integrity have prompted a situation. There may have been a legal issue.
11.Present: Harmony, fairness and integrity, morality and strategy are at play. The law is on your side.
11.Future: Harmony, fairness and integrity, morality and strategy will benefit you. You will get what you deserve.

12.Name: The Hanged Man
12.Past: There has been a delay or a new perspective. Self-sacrifice may have occurred.
12.Present: You are in a state of suspension and patience is required. You are gaining a new perspective.
12.Future: There will be a delay. You will gain a new perspective from waiting until a more suitable time.

13.Name: Death
13.Past: There has been a potent change or cessation.
13.Future: There will be a sudden and radical change

14.Name: Temperance
14.Past: There has been moderation and self-restraint.
14.Present: Now is the time for moderation and self-restraint.
14.Future: Moderation and self-restraint will be required.

15.Name: The Devil
15.Past: You have suffered from self-limiting beliefs and self-sabotaging actions. You have nobody to blame but yourself.
15.Present: You are suffering from self-limiting beliefs and self-sabotaging actions. You have nobody to blame but yourself, though you can choose a better course.
15.Future: You will suffer from self-limiting beliefs and self-sabotaging actions. You must be strong and objective and choose a better way.

16.Name: The Tower
16.Past: There has been the sudden collapse of a structure or institution.
16.Present: A structure or institution is collapsing. A deeply-ingrained pattern is unraveling.
16.Future: A structure or institution will collapse. Deeply ingrained patterns will change as a result. Hang on tight!

17.Name: The Star
17.Past: Great inspiration, hope, luck and optimism have influenced your current situation.
17.Present: There is currently great optimism, luck, tranquility and trust are present right now.
17.Future: A time of great hope and optimism is coming.

18.Name: The Moon
18.Past: Deep instinctual forces, concealment, occlusion, passivity and self-deception have weighed on the situation.
18.Present: Deep instinctual forces, concealment, occlusion, passivity and self-deception are weighing on the situation.
18.Future: Deep instinctual forces, concealment, occlusion, passivity and self-deception will weigh on the situation. Intuition from other worlds may present.

19.Name: The Sun
19.Past: There has been great success and fulfillment.
19.Present: Great success and fulfillment are afoot.
19.Future: There will be great success, fulfillment, reward and vitality.

20.Name: Judgment
20.Past: A situation came to an end and a judgment or evaluation was made.
20.Present: A situation is nearing its end and it is time to make an evaluation of it. A choice is being made.
20.Future: A situation will end soon. There will be an evaluation and possibly a choice.

21.Name: The World
21.Past: A situation came to a complete end. A goal was achieved. The querent is liberated.
21.Present: A situation is ending and liberation is attained. The end of one cycle clears way for a fresh start.
21.Future: A situation will come to an end soon. Freedom and liberation will result.

22.Name: Ace of Wands
22.Past: New inspirations and vitality have influenced the situation.
22.Present: New inspiration, vitality, a new venture or enterprise are afoot.
22.Future: There will be a new venture or enterprise accompanied by renewed inspiration and vitality.

23.Name: Two of Wands
23.Present: A great opportunity is presenting. An adventure is off to a good, but early, start.
23.Future: There will be an opportunity for a new venture or adventure.

25.Name: Four of Wands
25.Past: You have enjoyed a haven of refuge where you belonged and were comfortable.
25.Present: You are enjoying a haven of refuge where you belong and are comfortable.
25.Future: You will enjoy a haven of refuge where you belong and feel comfortable.

26.Name: Five of Wands
26.Past: There was an exciting exchange or challenge.
26.Present: An exciting exchange, competition or challenge is afoot.
26.Future: There will be an exciting exchange, competition or challenge.

27.Name: Six of Wands
27.Present: You are enjoying a victory or the likelihood of success is high.
27.Future: The likelihood of succeeding is very high. You will enjoy a victory.

28.Name: Seven of Wands
28.Past: You held your own from a position of advantage.
28.Present: You are holding your own from a position of advantage.
28.Future: You will be required to defend your position however you have the advantage.

29.Name: Eight of Wands
29.Past: There was a period of very fast movement and change.
29.Present: Everything is moving very fast, things will happen quickly now.
29.Future: There will be a period of very fast movement, energy and change.

30.Name: Nine of Wands
30.Past: You had to stand up for yourself against an attack.
30.Present: You are under attack and must stand up for yourself.
30.Future: You will be the subject of an attack and must stand up for yourself.

31.Name: Ten of Wands
31.Past: You have carried a heavy load and worked hard but success was a burden not a joy.
31.Present: You are carrying too much or working too hard and the burden of success is great.
31.Future: You are at risk of working too hard and finding the burden of success too great.

32.Name: Page of Wands
32.Past: There was a period of daring action and possibly good news. You may have met a daring and courageous person.
32.Present: This is a time of daring action and good news. You may know a person who is daring and courageous.
32.Future: Aa time of daring and good news. You may meet a person who is daring and courageous.

33.Name: Knight of Wands
33.Past: There was a change in your life circumstances. You may have met a person with creative energy who brought or is bringing change.
33.Present: A change is afoot in your life circumstances. You may know a person who is creative and brings change.
33.Future: There will be a change in your life circumstances You may meet a creative person who brings sudden change.

34.Name: Queen of Wands
34.Past: You have enjoyed balanced life, family and career interests. You may have met an attractive, magnetic and powerful woman.
34.Present: You are enjoying balanced life, family and career interests. You may know an attractive, magnetic, powerful woman.
34.Future: You will enjoy new balance of life, career and family. You may meet an attractive, magnetic woman.

35.Name: King of Wands
35.Past: You have enjoyed motivation, maturity and strength. You may have met a strong man.
35.Present: You are enjoying motivation, maturity and strength. You may know a strong man who helps you at this time.
35.Future: You will enjoy a period of motivation, maturity and strength. You may meet a strong man who assists you.

36.Name: Ace of Pentacles
36.Past: You had a windfall or some good luck leading to comfort or new beginnings.
36.Present: You are enjoying a period of good luck that will bring you comfort and prosperity.
36.Future: You will have some good luck or a windfall bringing renewed prosperity.

37.Name: Two of Pentacles
37.Past: You have endured a period of balancing finances carefully.
37.Present: You are experiencing a challenge balancing the demands placed on you.
37.Future: You will experience a period where balance is important and may cause stress.

38.Name: Three of Pentacles
38.Past: You have applied your talents to best effect and done a good job.
38.Present: You are doing a great job and applying your talents effectively.
38.Future: You will be in a position to do an excellent job. Be sure to apply your telnets carefully to reap the rewards.

39.Name: Four of Pentacles
39.Past: You have experienced a period of holding tight or standing still.
39.Present: You are holding tight for gain or preservation. It may be to your advantage but likely doesn’t feel good.
39.Future: You will be forced to hold on tight to get what you want.

40.Name: Five of Pentacles
40.Past: You have experienced a period of financial or spiritual poverty and desperation.
40.Present: You are experiencing a period of poverty and desperation.
40.Future: A period of lack, poverty or despair may befall you. You should have another tarot reading soon.

41.Name: Six of Pentacles
41.Past: You have come through a period of give and take where generosity played a part in your experience.
41.Present: You may need to be generous or rely on the generosity of others, or both, at this time.
41.Future: You are entering a time where generosity will be important. You may need to be generous or accept the generosity of others.

42.Name: Seven of Pentacles
42.Past: You have been patient and tended your garden which has led to rewards accumulating for you.
42.Present: You must be patient and tend your garden. Rewards will accrue from your perseverance.
42.Future: You will exhibit patience and reap great rewards from your perseverance.

43.Name: Eight of Pentacles
43.Past: You have enjoyed an apprenticeship and acquired skills and motivation to use your talents well.
43.Present: You are enjoying an apprenticeship and acquiring skills and motivation to use your talents well.
43.Future: You will enter an apprenticeship or period of learning new skills.

44.Name: Nine of Pentacles
44.Past: You have been self-reliant in spiritual, life and financial affairs. This self-reliance has been important to you.
44.Present: You are very self-sufficient and are enjoying prosperity and success as a result.
44.Future: You will be required to be self-sufficient to care for your life, financial and spiritual needs.

45.Name: Ten of Pentacles
45.Past: You have enjoyed significant support and comfort from your family affairs bringing wealth and security.
45.Present: You are enjoying significant support and comfort from your family affairs bringing wealth and security.
45.Future: You will enjoy significant support and comfort from your family affairs bringing wealth and security.

46.Name: Page of Pentacles
46.Past: You have enjoyed a small financial gain or learned a lesson. You may have met a young person who is financially wise and reflective.
46.Present: You are learning a lesson and may be receiving a small financial gain. You may know a young, financially wise and reflective person who helps you.
46.Future: You may learn a lesson or receive a small financial gain. You may meet a young, financially wise and reflective person.

47.Name: Knight of Pentacles
47.Past: You have made steady and tangible progress. You may have met a conscientious, dependable person.
47.Present: You are making steady and tangible progress in life and finances. You may know a conscientious, dependable person who helps you.
47.Future: You will make steady and tangible progress in life and finances. You may meet a conscientious, dependable person who helps you.

48.Name: Queen of Pentacles
48.Past: You have taken a sensible approach. You may have met a businesswoman who helped you.
48.Present: You are taking a sensible approach. You may know a shrewd businesswoman who helps you.
48.Future: You are going to take a sensible approach. You may meet a shrewd businesswoman to help you.

49.Name: King of Pentacles
49.Past: You have enjoyed shrewd , practical business dealings. You may have met a wise businessman who helped you.
49.Present: You are enjoying a period of shrewd, practical dealings in life and business, you may know a wise businessman who helps you.
49.Future: You will enjoy a period of shrewd, practical dealings in life and business, you may meet a wise businessman who helps you.

50.Name: Ace of Swords
50.Past: You have enjoyed an infusion of strength which may have helped you in adversity.
50.Present: You are enjoying renewed strength in the face of adversity. You are determined and courageous at this time.
50.Future: You will enjoy renewed strength in the face of adversity. You will be determined and courageous.

51.Name: Two of Swords
51.Past: You experienced a stalemate or impasse where your energies and experiences were stuck.
51.Present: You are stuck in an experience of stalemate or impasse.
51.Future: You will experience a period of stalemate, impasse or frustration.

52.Name: Three of Swords
52.Past: You have gone through a period of heartache, loss or woe. It was likely necessary for your growth.
52.Present: You are going through a period of heartache, loss or woe. It is likely necessary for your growth.
52.Future: Batten down the hatches! You will experience a period of heartache. You should have another tarot reading soon.

53.Name: Four of Swords
53.Past: You have had a well-deserved rest.
53.Present: You are enjoying a period of well-deserved rest. Make the most of it!
53.Future: You will enjoy a period of well-deserved rest. Make the most of it!

54.Name: Five of Swords
54.Past: You experienced jealousy and one-upmanship, humiliation and wounded pride or you inflicted it on another.
54.Present: You are entwined in a game of one-upmanship. Wounded pride and humiliation are not far behind.
54.Future: You will get entwined in a game of one-upmanship. Wounded pride and humiliation are not far behind.

55.Name: Six of Swords
55.Past: You have started enjoying brighter times and maybe a reconciliation.
55.Present: You are enjoying brighter times and maybe a reconciliation.
55.Future: You will enjoy brighter times and maybe a reconciliation.

56.Name: Seven of Swords
56.Past: You experienced stealth or a display of the unexpected. You may have committed or experienced trickery
56.Present: You are experiencing stealth or a display of the unexpected. You may be committing or experiencing trickery
56.Future: You will experience stealth or a display of the unexpected. You may commit or experience trickery

57.Name: Eight of Swords
57.Past: You were trapped in an oppressive situation
57.Present: You are trapped in an oppressive situation, holding a defensive perimeter.
57.Future: You will be trapped in an oppressive situation, holding a defensive perimeter.

58.Name: Nine of Swords
58.Past: You have experienced a period of despair that was troubling but may have seemed worse than it was.
58.Present: You are experiencing a period of despair that is troubling but may, like a nightmare, be unreal.
58.Future: You will experience a period of despair that is troubling but may, like a nightmare, be unreal.

59.Name: Ten of Swords
59.Past: There has been an irrevocable ending. You can’t do anything about it. The situation is not reversible but a new dawn is coming soon.
59.Present: You are experiencing an irrevocable ending. You can’t do anything about it, The situation is not reversible but a new dawn is coming soon.
59.Future: You will experience an irrevocable ending. Once over, the situation is not reversible but a new dawn will come soon after

60.Name: Page of Swords
60.Past: You may have had bad news or a met a person who is cold, clinical, precocious and decisive.
60.Present: You may be experiencing bad news or a know a person who is cold, clinical, precocious and decisive who will affect your circumstances.
60.Future: You may experience bad news or a meet a person who is cold, clinical, precocious and decisive who will affect your circumstances.

61.Name: Knight of Swords
61.Past: You have experienced blunt communication, or swift and sudden change. You may have met a strong, assertive leader.
61.Present: You are experiencing blunt communication, or swift and sudden change. You may know a strong, assertive leader to guide you.
61.Future: You will experience blunt communication, or swift and sudden change. You may meet a strong, assertive leader to guide you.

62.Name: Queen of Swords
62.Past: You have experienced  solitude which gave you time to think rationally. You may have met a strong, analytical and aloof woman.
62.Present: You are experiencing  solitude which gives you time to think rationally. You may know a strong, analytical and aloof woman.
62.Future: You will experience  solitude which gives you time to think rationally. You may meet a strong, analytical and aloof woman.

63.Name: King of Swords
63.Past: You experienced authority and command  without emotion. You may have met a man who is cold and authoritative.
63.Present: You are experiencing authority and command  without emotion. You may know a man who is cold and authoritative who is affecting your situation.
63.Future: You will experience authority and command  without emotion. You may meet a man who is cold and authoritative who affects your situation..

64.Name: Ace of Cups
64.Past: You have found new love or a stirring of passions.
64.Present: You are experiencing new love or happiness or a stirring of passions.
64.Future: You will experience new love or happiness or a stirring of passions.

65.Name: Two of Cups
65.Past: You have enjoyed a happy union, romance or affair.
65.Present: You are experiencing a happy union, romance or affair.
65.Future: You will experience a happy union, romance or affair.

66.Name: Three of Cups
66.Past: You have had a celebration, reunion or joyful occasion.
66.Present: You are having a celebration, reunion or joyful occasion.
66.Future: You will have a celebration, reunion or joyful occasion.

67.Name: Four of Cups
67.Past: You have experienced a period dissatisfaction, boredom and discontent. You may have been unable to see your advantages because you focused on the negative.
67.Present: You are experiencing dissatisfaction, boredom and discontent. You cannot see the good things in your life because you are blinded by the negative.
67.Future: You will experience dissatisfaction, boredom and discontent Be careful you don’t get blinded by the negative and loose sight of the good things in your life.

68.Name: Five of Cups
68.Past: You have experienced loss and disappointment, sadness or mourning.
68.Present: You are experiencing loss and disappointment, sadness or mourning.
68.Future: You will experience loss and disappointment, sadness or mourning. Have another tarot reading soon.

69.Name: Six of Cups
69.Past: You have experienced a period of innocence, nostalgia or reliving the past.
69.Present: You are reliving the past or experiencing nostalgia or innocence.
69.Future: You will enter a period of nostalgia where you relive the past and experience fond memories or innocence.

70.Name: Seven of Cups
70.Past: You have been daydreaming or living in a state of confusion or overwhelm.
70.Present: You are daydreaming or living in a state of confusion or overwhelm.
70.Future: You will enter a period of daydreaming  where you will experience confusion and overwhelm.

71.Name: Eight of Cups
71.Past: You have had a change of heart and  have begun moving on.
71.Present: You are having a change of heart and have begun moving on.
71.Future: You will have a change of heart requiring you to move on.

72.Name: Nine of Cups
72.Present: Your wishes are fulfilled at this time.
72.Future: Your wishes will shortly be fulfilled.

73.Name: Ten of Cups
73.Past: You have enjoyed harmony in your interpersonal relationships.
73.Present: You are enjoying harmony in your interpersonal relationships.
73.Future: You will enjoy harmony in your interpersonal relationships.

74.Name: Page of Cups
74.Past: You have received an invitation or overture of friendship. You may have experienced increased sensitivity or met a young affectionate person.
74.Present: You are in receipt of an invitation to a friendship or social event. You may be feeling sensitive or may know a sensitive young person who has influence on your situation.
74.Future: You will receive an invitation or somebody will make friends with you. You may feel sensitive or make friends with a assistive person.

75.Name: Knight of Cups
75.Past: You have started a new relationship, romance or artistic endeavour. You may have met a romantic or idealistic young man.
75.Present: You are starting a new relationship, romance or artistic endeavour. You may know a romantic or idealistic young man who has bearing on your situation.
75.Future: You will start a new relationship, romance or artistic endeavour. You may meet a romantic or idealistic young man who will have bearing on your situation.

76.Name: Queen of Cups
76.Past: You have experienced deep nurturing feelings. You may have met a motherly figure.
76.Present: You are experiencing deep nurturing feelings. You may know a motherly figure who has bearing on your situation.
76.Future: You will experience deep nurturing feelings. You may meet a motherly figure who has bearing on your situation.

77.Name: King of Cups
77.Past: You have received or required wise counsel. You may have met a wise and emotionally intelligent man.
77.Present: You are receiving or you require wise counsel. You may know a wise and emotionally intelligent man who can help you.
77.Future: You will benefit from wise counsel. You may meet a wise and emotionally intelligent man who can help you.
